title: Clube Atlético Colatinense
text:
Clube Atlético Colatinense, commonly known as Colatinense, is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Colatina">Colatina</a>, <a href="Esp%C3%ADrito%20Santo">Espírito Santo state</a>.
History.
The club was founded on October 17, 2005. Colatinense won the <a href="Campeonato%20Capixaba%20%28lower%20levels%29">Campeonato Capixaba Second Level</a> in 2006.
Stadium.
Clube Atlético Colatinense play their home games at <a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20Municipal%20Justiniano%20de%20Melo%20e%20Silva">Estádio Municipal Justiniano de Melo e Silva</a>. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 12,000 people.
